00039 class KviMaskEditor;

00041 
00042 typedef struct _KviMaskEntry
00043 {
00044         QString szMask;
00045         QString szSetBy;
00046         unsigned int uSetAt;
00047 } KviMaskEntry;
00048 
00049 class KviMaskItem: public QTreeWidgetItem
00050 {
00051 public:
00052         KviMaskItem(QTreeWidget* parent,KviMaskEntry* entry);
00053         ~KviMaskItem();
00054 
00055         KviMaskEntry* mask() { return &m_Mask; };
00056 protected:
00057         KviMaskEntry m_Mask;
00058         bool operator<(const QTreeWidgetItem &other)const
00059         {
00060                 // This is the sorting function for KviMaskItem
00061                 switch(treeWidget()->sortColumn())
00062                 {
00063                         case 0:
00064                                 return m_Mask.szMask < ((KviMaskItem *) &other)->mask()->szMask;
00065                                 break;
00066                         case 1:
00067                                 return m_Mask.szSetBy < ((KviMaskItem*) &other)->mask()->szSetBy;
00068                                 break;
00069                         case 2:
00070                                 return m_Mask.uSetAt < ((KviMaskItem*) &other)->mask()->uSetAt;
00071                                 break;
00072                 }
00073                 return 0; //make compiler happy
00074         }
00075 
00076 };
